MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL78 postcode area of Bryn Teg, affecting properties in Bryn Teg and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:23PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 00:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:00PM on 16th April 2021
